name: Sand Pirates
description:
Sand Pirates - test racing project that was made in a month by a small dev team: Mark Scherbak (@mark.shcherbak), Alexander Skurchik (@rksy) and Nikita Vilisov (@vilisix). 

It's an arcade race game with abilities and shooting system.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button / Up Arrow - Use Primary ability

Right Mouse Button / Spacebar - Use Secondary ability

TAB / V - Change main camera view

Middle Mouse Button / C - Rear camera view
